actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to authorize an additional 41,000 miles for the National System of Interstate and Defense Highways.

summary.text: Interstate Highway System Extension Act - Increases from 41,000 to 82,000 the number of miles authorized to be constructed under the National System of Interstate and Defense Highways. Sets forth provisions governing the apportionment of funds between the States. Authorizes appropriations to construct the Interstate System and for interest payments on notes.

titles.title: A bill to authorize an additional 41,000 miles for the National System of Interstate and Defense Highways.
